short_summary: Implementation of a demountable partition system within the existing space of the National Hydrology Research Centre in Saskatoon, SK.
description: The department is procuring a demountable partition system for the implementation of a pilot project within the Centre's existing space.
full_summary:
### Demountable Partition System Tender

#### Reference  | WS3816896079-Doc3819579868
#### Solicitation | WS3816896079
#### Tender Publication Date  | 2023-01-09
#### Tender Closing Date | 2023-01-24T14:00:00 EST

#### Notice Type | Request for Proposal
#### Notice | Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC) is soliciting proposals for the installation of a demountable partition system at their National Hydrology Research Centre (NHRC) facility in Saskatoon, SK. The contract is part of the Government of Canada's initiative, the GC Workplace - Future of the Workplace pilot project.

#### Contract Information
* Contract Type: Request for Proposal
* Contract Duration: July 2023 – March 2024
* Installation Location: National Hydrology Research Centre (NHRC), Saskatoon, SK
* Trade Agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

#### Eligibility
Participation is open to qualified contractors who are authorized under the above-mentioned trade agreements to conduct business in Canada.

#### Contract Evaluation Criteria
* Lowest Bidder

#### Contract Award
The contract will be awarded to the bidder with the lowest total bid price received.

#### Tender Documents
Tender documents are available on the Ariba Discovery website at [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15081061?extsite=MTUwODEwNjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15081061?extsite=MTUwODEwNjFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

#### Contact Information
Christopher Lau, Procurement Specialist
Phone: [None]
Email: [christopher.lau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:christopher.lau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5

Please disregard the initial closing time for the tender. All supporting documentation and bids must be submitted by 2023-01-24 at 02:00 EST. Any submissions received after this time will not be considered responsive.

Tenders are open, and all eligible participants can submit their proposals. The selected bidder will be awarded
